sentences: Charlotte Amy Jacks, commonly known as Charlie Jacks, is an English former Page 3 glamour model turned pop singer, based in southeast London.
Her single "Come On" sold 35,000 copies in a single day.
In 2012, Jacks signed a management deal with BoomHaus Recordings, Sony Music Japan, Manhattan Records Lexington Corp (JP)
She released her recent single, "Speakerphone" 16 August 2012 as a free download.
Her mother is the Sun newspaper's official Page 3 photographer, Alison Webster, and her stepfather is the Sun's former deputy editor, Geoff Webster.
